website_summaries.verdict: With consistent use, many users rate Physician’s Choice Collagen Peptides powder their top collagen product.
pros: Provides skin more elasticity, stronger and longer hair and nails, and improved joint pain
cons: Some people don’t like the taste, or the coating it leaves in dishes/glasses
Can cause GI distress in some users

customer_reviews.title: Quality Collagen...Really good Results
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different collagens and the results of this particular brand are far above what I have seen from other collagens brands I've tried. I will say it doesn't mix as well in cold water as some brands I have tried, but on the other hand, when I switched to putting it in coffee or a smoothie from trying it in my cold lemon water it was totally fine no issues whatsoever. The difference I have seen using this brand has been nothing short of amazing. I've noticed a huge improvement in my hair and nails. I bought this collagen looking for results and that is what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Strengthened my nails, my skin cleared and my hair got stronger within two weeks of using this collagen. Mixed with vitamin C produces faster absorption, hence faster results. I take this collagen mixed with water and vitamin c powder in the morning or evening.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Best collagen for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Love these collagen peptides! They have added enzymes which make them 5X more absorbable in the body..which means your not throwing money down the drain. There is also no “flavor”. I’ve tried quite a few different collagen peptides and some (even though say unflavored) have a slight flavor. I've also been learning more about collagen and it's health benefits like how it helps with muscle growth and my husband has even mentioned that it has been helping his digestive issues. I add it daily to my pre-workout drink and I also love adding it to my overnight oats, chocolate avocado protein pudding and my BCAA's. It's so easy to use and the older we get the more we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Groff

customer_reviews.title: No taste collagen
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I use it every morning in my coffee. I can’t taste any difference nor in texture. I can tell that after I run my joints aren’t as achey as they have been so this is a plus. I recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Francis

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I can already see a difference in my hair and nails. I absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: HAIR GROWTH
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! I just finished a container after taking it once a day in my coffee, you can see my bald spots are growing hair. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ron D.

customer_reviews.title: Container was half empty
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product yesterday and opened the container this morning and it’s half empty. It says that it’s supposed to have 30 servings in it but don’t see how that is possible with the amount that is in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Schoneman

customer_reviews.title: Third bottle
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my third bottle of this collagen, I had been overly satisfied until now. I have always put it into my coffee each morning without taste difference, this time was totally different, HORRIBLE TASTE. The container was less than half full when previous containers were 3/4 full, and the label was totally different from the first two containers. I have previously left a comment that this product is AWESOME, but beware!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY CAPPS

customer_reviews.title: Half empty
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Opened it and half empty! Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anna Klauer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. My arthritis feels better in my knees. I have more energy. Nails are growing. My skin looks great. I recommend this 💯
customer_reviews.author: Darci Harris

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED HALF EMPTY
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed after opening the case to see it’s half empty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Radvan

customer_reviews.title: Half full can .. Sad
customer_reviews.text: I received yesterday, when open up, my can was half full.. Don't understand.. I don't mind paying for what I want, but this can is not right..
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Best collagen peptides!
customer_reviews.text: With all the new craze of collagen peptides, I’d been dying to try these out! Physician’s Choice is listed on Amazon as the users favorite choice, so I chose it. I’ve been taking collagen pills for years but powder is so much better! I’d recommend putting the Physician’s Choice Collagen Peptide powder in coffee or a smoothie, it dissolves very quickly and it is flavorless which I love. Only con is if you put it in room temp or cold water, it will NOT dissolve. I noticed the minor ridges on my nails improving and my hair is seriously the thickest and longest it’s ever been!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived and I opened it it seemed like it was only 1/3 full I’m sure they would say that was from some sort of settling but I don’t think so my other (light blue container) peptide didn’t arrive in this state . Disappointed and going back to my original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am using it almost two weeks now, and notice a real.difference in skin tone and texture. Facial lines are less noticable, and my hair is healthy and has its bounce back. (I coupled this with a biotin supplememt.) Its odorless, tasteless and blends perfectly in hot or cold drinks. I mix it with my iced tea and stir well. Highly recommend for maturing skin, and plan.to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Outstander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Today I open the container and the container was half full !!!! I feel cheated!! I now I don't know if the product was a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: A.Cristina Cubillas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its promise
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this every morning in my coffee. It mixes very easily and has no taste or texture change. I have had a few different positive results. 1. My skin is so clear, and soft. It’s better than it’s been in years and is like porcelain smooth. 2. I eat A very healthy life style, but this has helped curb any cravings as well- something I was NOT expecting. 3. My nails and hair are both growing like crazy. It’s only been 3 weeks but I noticed changes about 2 weeks in. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Smells like vomit, rotten eggs, spoiled taste
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the 1 and 2 star reviews to see if anyone else experienced the same problem I had and sure enough there are others who had a horrible smelling batch. I thought it was something like vomit and spoiled eggs. I am returning this. Ive had other powders, Whole Foods brand, it taste like vanilla and had no oder I could mix with water and drink, I only tried this thinking it was more potent but I will be switching back.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I've been adding it to my coffee every morning for about 6 weeks now, and I'm never going to look back. I bought it to help with skin quality after weight loss and pregnancies, but it is helping my degenerative disc disease so much that that had taken over the spotlight. I used to live on voltaren run and heating pads for my lower back (which is jacked up,) but now it's only every now and then when I overdo it at work or the gym. Cannot say enough good things about this product that stirs seamlessly and tasteless into my coffee! Will be a forever customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: The only supplement that’s worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It’s only been 2 weeks and I’ve already noticed an improvement in my hair, skin and nails. As well as improved gut health! This is my second supplement that I’ve purchased and I’m so happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: returning
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that I can see the powder in my liquids in the morning - specifically in my coffee. I'm returning this and switching back to Vital Proteins.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel bad!
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first time to take a full dose of this. I feel awful, shaky, and just weird about an hour afterwards. Would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking collagen for years, but I still had to have an adjustment faze for this product. Had some stomach upset the first time I took it. After I started small and worked up to the recommended dose, I have been able to enjoy this product. It mixes great with no flavor or mouthfeel. It seems to work as well as other products I have tried, maybe a little better.
customer_reviews.author: A. DIMICO

customer_reviews.title: Great product,
customer_reviews.text: I love to mix this into my oats in the morning, coffee or smoothie! Great ingredient and a big part of my morning routine to add extra protein, extra boost for my skin and nails. It doesn't taste anything which make it a great product to add into your drink!
customer_reviews.author: Malin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Joint pain and more
customer_reviews.text: This product I used at first for joint pain. Knees, and lower back . My results have been outstanding! And I’ve noticed how my skin especially under my chin is firmer, my hair thicker, and my finger and toenails are very strong! I put a scoop in my daily coffee! No aftertaste at all! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: NJ Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase. I'm not seeing the effects collagen the way I have with other brands, also I read that this has a lot of fillers that other brands don't have. There was also a supposed deal and if you write a review do you get a free bottle which is why I think this has so many good reviews, but they didn't honor that promise anyway. I would give it this less than one star.
customer_reviews.author: LRQ

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 full container
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Collagen powder & opened the container to find it 1/2 full. Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: I truly don’t know how people take this. I have been bed ridden for the last two days with the worst stomachache of my life and I feel so weak. I have had extreme nausea, diarrhea, acid reflux, phlegm in my throat, hard stomach. I cannot believe I’m having a reaction to this extent, I have never had a reaction to... anything, really. Buyer, beware of the possible side effects as they are no joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Digestive Enzymes Made a Difference With IBD
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me to assimilate more easily the collagen intestinally since I suffer from Irritable Bowel Disorder, due to the added enzymes. After only a few weeks of use, I noticed a difference in my nail growth, hair growth, and in the decrease of joint and intestinal discomfort. I have used it for several months now and have experienced a marked difference far more than in any other collagen products that I have tried in the past. No flavor, but I prefer that since it's easy to mix with just about anything. Based on my own experience, I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dant

customer_reviews.title: Love the quick results!
customer_reviews.text: After 11 days, I noticed a significant reduction in my cellulite! My sister and mom have ordered some as well after I showed them! Even though I’ve always worked out frequently and ate healty, there was always some stubbon cellulite I could not get rid of. I could not believe the improvements in such a short period of time! I also noticed my knees don’t hurt as much when doing leg workouts. I’ve seen improvements in my complexion and skin moisture. I am very excited to see more improvements the longer I take it. Also it is completely tasteless and disolves immediately in my black coffee. LOVE this product so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Magazu

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I have had noticeable difference in my face since taking this collagen. I have even been getting compliments about how good my skin has been looking. It’s easy to mix into my coffee, tea, smoothies, and juice. There’s no clumping. I did notice that it blends in better when the liquid is hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised - much improved skin
customer_reviews.text: I only recently started trying supplements to give my body what it needs, with my skin being the primary concern. I've had horrible skin and dermatitis for most of my adult life and I have to say: after using this product for close to three weeks, my skin looks and feels better. The dryness has subsided considerably and I will continue to use this product
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good product my skin is glowing and moisture I look better every day
customer_reviews.author: belkin pineda

customer_reviews.title: Rancid? Bad batch? I don’t know, very disappointed though.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, with all the other good reviews I thought this would be tasteless and odorless. I don’t know if I received a bad batch or what, but the scent of the powder smells so rancid. Like a dead animal. I have no idea what is wrong with it, but I’ve had to plug my nose just to consume it. It doesn’t taste as awful as it smells but it’s really unsettling. I have however noticed in the 3 days I’ve taken it that I had more energy but I don’t think I can keep taking it as the smell is that bad, it makes it almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Bree King

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible after taste. Tastes like what I would imagine cowhide tastes like. I have used several collagen powders over the last 4 years. This is the only one that tastes bad that I have had!
customer_reviews.author: Cjl

customer_reviews.title: Weird flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This collagen tastes horrible. I have bought many different brands and thought I would give this one a try. I tried it in my coffee this morning and I wasn't able to even drink it. I honestly would not recommend this product and I would never buy it again. Unfortunately I have to throw the whole thing away. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Az

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how quickly I'm seeing results
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking your collagen for about a week for hair thinning, I have been taking pictures since the beginning of my hair thinning. I can see the that my hair us thicker already.
customer_reviews.author: Cheliya Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great collagen powder!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first collagen powder that I have tried that dissolves totally in my tea and has no flavor. I also like that you don’t need to use as much as some collagen powders as they found a way to make it more absorbable by our bodies. really recommend this one. It’s so much nicer than swallowing collagen pills also.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be bigger....and more full.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Not usually a pessimist but its half full 🤨 . Is that normal?
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Raschkow

customer_reviews.title: Causes u to crap ur brains out!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It leaves an aftertaste in my coffee and causes cramps and diarrhea which lasted for two days!! Had to miss work for one of those two days!! Bowels still sore!! Will not order ever again!! Total waist of my money!!! Only took this twice been down for four days!! So unless u like spending precious time on the porcelain throne, then dont buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I assume the added enzyme for better absorption did not agree with my digestive system. This product gave me BAD tummy aches, had to stop taking it, wasted my money :/
customer_reviews.author: Y H

customer_reviews.title: Half gone
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this before and I like it. This time I recieved it, it was only half full. Too expensive for that!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Mixes with everything
customer_reviews.text: Mixes completely with everything, even cold drinks. It’s never clumpy and I can just stir by hand. I have mainly been using it in my morning coffee to supplement my diet, but it is flavorless so you can mix it with anything. I have some autoimmune joint issues and read that collagen was a great way to help keep joints as healthy as possible. I have been very happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this product the first time that I ordered. The second time that I bought the product, the container was filled less than half way. Definitely not worth the money if you get less than half of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Increased vocal stamina, healthy hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: Collagen peptides are a part of my daily routine. As a professional singer, I find I experience less vocal fatigue while taking collagen. In addition, my skin and hair benefit greatly from my daily dose of collagen as heavy stage makeup and excessive heat on my hair can both be damaging. I was concerned about switching to physicians choice because the amount of collagen per serving is much less than other brands, but I haven’t noticed any decrease in the affects. This is likely due to the increased absorption.
customer_reviews.author: lilbabysoprano

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products to help with the pain and swelling in my fingers due to arthritis. None seemed to help. After taking Physicians Collagen Peptides, I have noticed less swelling and pain. Also, my nails and hair are growing longer and stronger. I am pleased with the results and will continue to take this product. I believe with continued use my results will be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not able to handle a strange horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying Physician’s Choice, and can not handle a slight but definitely noticeable taste like vomit or bike. I will go back to my previous brand. I tried using one scoop in my coffee (with cream).
customer_reviews.author: candy peleaux

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a collagen product. I am blown away at how my skin looks and feels. I had weekly breakouts and was not sure what was causing my breakouts. I removed fatty foods from my diet and started taking the collagen peptides daily. My skin is now glowing and clear. The taste is also very light and hard to detect when mixed with other flavors. I like to mix it with smoothies and almond milk after work. I will definitely be purchasing this item once it runs out. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, dissolves quickly, and no weird taste.
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg you guys! I've been dying to try collagen for my hair, skin, and achy knees but heard varying reviews regarding taste for different brands. This collagen powder has NO taste at all. I tried it in my coffee before I even added creamer and could not taste it at all! Additionally this collagen powder dissolves even faster than creamer! I will update my review regarding results after one month but for now I am happy that my sensitive taste buds found a good quality collagen supplement that is keto friendly and that I don't mind drinking everyday!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste was absolutely nasty. I bought the unflavored and it taste like spoiled milk! I tried adding to my coffee, tea and protein shakes and You can’t hide the taste of spoiled milk! Not purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Swhitz

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never buy again. You taste this in your coffee. Ugh. Doesn’t mix well either 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Faith Todd

customer_reviews.title: no taste
customer_reviews.text: Used product to promote healthy skin, hair and nails. I saw an improve in my skin in one week and less aches in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McKinnie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes exactly like a dirty, wet dog smells!
customer_reviews.text: This should not be sold for human consumption. I have tried quite a few different kinds of collagen. I guess the pretty pink label caught my attention. The first time I used it was in some soup, I thought I just didn’t like the soup. The second Tim I put it in my Venti coffee, I seriously almost vomited. The only way I can describe the flavor is, it tasted like what a wet dirty dog smells like. I am scared to think what it could even be made from. DO NOT TRY THIS, TRUST ME!!!
customer_reviews.author: CatWilson

customer_reviews.title: My only qualm is it is half empty from the start
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package today and very excited to get started. My only qualm is it came half empty. I would love for it to be a full canister. Duly, because it’s not cheap
customer_reviews.author: taja

customer_reviews.title: 24.5 servings
customer_reviews.text: This product does not provide 30 servings as advertised. When I recieved the item and opened it, it was half full. For the price I figured I would test it to see if it would indeed provide 30 servings and it failed the test.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Collagen Powder is a keeper!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for eleven days. I add it to my morning coffee. The most notable result I see is the density of my eyelashes. My lashes are usually quite thin and short. I see some length and thickness now when I apply mascara. I am also seeing visible results around my nose and mouth. This area is plumper and my skin actually springs back when I touch it. I am quite surprised by these results since the short time I've been using the product. I am excited about the results so far. I plan to continue using this product as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Fresholive, NC

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I got a bad batch or what but the taste of this collagen is terrible. I thought I could just put up with it but today is the third day of trying to drink my coffee with it mixed in and I can't do it! I have tried several different brands and none of them tasted like this. I seen one review saying they had bought this 2 times and loved it but the last one they got tasted bad. That tells me that it's not supposed to taste like this...
customer_reviews.author: R Yeske

customer_reviews.title: Gums, Skin, Nails, Hair improving
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and hit the jackpot on Physician's Choice Collagen Peptides. No taste, dissolves easily, and overwhelming improvement in all things teeth, bone, hair and nails. Added to my morning routine in coffee to improve gum health. On my fourth canister, dentist sees gum recession reversing, and teeth have dramatically tightened up. Added benefits are hair thickness and growth proclaimed by my hair dresser. Manicurist remarks about the length and strength of my nails. And my skin lady says my face elasticity and plumpness of skin is increasing. With those kinds of third party observations, continued use is more than a choice. Age 71, feeling 50.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: this is the only collagen powder I found so far that I do not taste in my coffee! I love what it does for my digestive system, my skin and my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Possible stomach cramps
customer_reviews.text: I have used collagen powder before but the brand I trust was out of stock, so I gave this a try. After using this product it gave me a cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My skin, hair and nails were dry and brittle. I live in Colorado where there is barely any humidity. My nails are now strong, new growth hair is much softer, and my skin is much more supple! And my leg, with a metal rod, is not nearly as stiff or sore! Yay! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Conway

customer_reviews.title: I am definitely impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this product vs. other collagen products I have tried in the past. I also like that it easily dissolves in my coffee or smoothies with absolutely no aftertaste. I haven't noticed any difference in my nails and hair, however, I feel my immune system has been given a boost as I have been exposed to people with colds and have been lucky to not have caught any virus so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad
customer_reviews.text: Awful! I will not be purchasing this product again. This is my second container and it is NOT the same as the contents in the container I purchased the first time. This time the powder when mixed in my coffee smelled and tasted terrible!!! It was disgusting. I compared the powder to what I had remaining in the container I initially purchased and there was a clear difference. My second containers powder was more course, more beige in color as if it were a different manufacturer. I'm disappointed and this stuff is too expensive to be that inconsistent. Going back to the other brand....
customer_reviews.author: A. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gives results
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the simplicity to use and the results are great. It is so easy to drink every day, I add it to my morning coffee or mix it with sugar free drink mix and I get my daily collagen dose. I absolutely saw results in the overall appearance of my skin and after over a month of once a day collagen powder I have noticed an increased tightness in my cheeks and lip areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My container only had 21 servings, not the 30 stated on the label
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews of people opening this product up and the container being only half full, but I ordered it anyway. When I opened mine up it was in fact half full. I wrote the date I started using it on the bottom of the container, 2/6/20, one scoop a day. Today it is 2/27/20 and I had my last scoop. 21 scoops/servings. The container said it contained 30 servings. That is a huge difference. I think the big issue here is truth in labeling, which clearly Physicians is in violation. I will not be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Dana

customer_reviews.title: Side effects 👎
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop after only a few weeks of use. As I finally found the source of my GAS and bloating ! I can handle the discomfort but not the Embarrassment! Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Marnywebster

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste!
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to enjoying collagen in my morning coffee, but this brand tastes terrible. It tastes like soap! I could hardly get my coffee down the hatch. I’m not sure I can even eat it again. Other brands have great flavor. This one, not so much!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stronger & Healthier Joints
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Physician's Collagen Peptides for almost a month now and it is great!! It doesn't have a smell like some of the other do when you open the bottle. I love that it also has digestive enzymes in it for my tummy. I put it in my smoothies every morning and if I don't make a smoothie, I add it to my coffee and it doesn't change the flavor at all. Since I've been using the Physician's Collagen I have definitely noticed that my knees aren't making that crackling noise when I go up stairs. \o/ I definitely recommend this product and have already told several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Great collagen powder - no strange flavor or texture
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with my daily protein shake and it blends perfectly - no strange flavor or texture. I've been using this for almost 2 months and have really noticed improvement in my nails. They're now growing quickly and are very strong - they're no longer breaking and peeling like they were before. I'm also noticing improvements in my skin (especially my face) - the skin seems to be more plump and smooth and less "crepe"-ish. I will definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: Going back to Vital Proteins
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Vital Proteins, but decided to try this as it had good reviews and was cheaper. From the moment I got it, I swore I smelled something fishy. I used it for about 2 weeks and my skin broke out in a terrible rash.
customer_reviews.author: K7398

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste in coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I use collagen powder in my coffee every morning. I bought this one to try something different, and it is NOT good. Has a terrible taste. Made my coffee taste like I used spoiled creamer. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! Product safety recall!
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of taking this I got bad mouth sores but did not make the connection. Stopped taking while I was traveling and the sores were gone. Started consuming when I returned from my travels and the sores were back. That’s when I suspected there was a connection. Stopped taking and the sores are slowing going away. Today I got a product safety notification email from amazon about an FDA recall on this product. I need to stop falling for all this junk.
customer_reviews.author: shabyg

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had used other collagen powders in the past and was never blown away by the results, but Physician's Choice Collagen Peptides has exceeded my expectations. I know these are working within the first 30 days of use because my hair and nails are growing considerably faster than when I used brands like Sports Research. I really think the digestive enzymes help with this formula. I recommend it to anyone looking for better skin, hair, nails, and joint pain relief. *I did receive a free bottle for this review, but this is the best CP formula I've used so I would have written it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Paxton Drexler

customer_reviews.title: Skin is glowing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using another collagen powder for a while and it seemed like the effects had declined. A co-worker suggested this one and now after 2 weeks of daily use I can see and feel a difference! My skin has a glow and feels softer and my nails look and feel stronger. I haven't experienced any digestive issues, which is a good thing! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Plastic Avenger

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to wait until I finished this product before reviewing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I finished this product before reviewing to see if it worked. Unfortunately it only had 19 servings in it instead of the advertised 30. The container was only 1/2 full when received but I had high hopes it was just compressed. Nope! In that little bit of time, I've not noticed a change. Will be changing to a different brand as I don't like being ripped off!
customer_reviews.author: Judie B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Makes an awful mess in my mug. Leaves a coating all over it. Stopped using it. Have never had collagen powder do this before.
customer_reviews.author: dmidgie

customer_reviews.title: There are BETTER brands than this, read:
customer_reviews.text: Returned. I prefer Sports Research brand over this for multiple reasons: this powder is smalle & higher priced, coagulates when trying to stir, has a smell of baby formula, leaves a filmy residue on my cup (I use in my coffee stainless steel cup daily). I experienced none of these issues with the other mentioned brand & that one worked (joints, hair and skin—Do a search for it and pass on this.) The only reason I ordered this over my tried and true, is because the SR product was not available as Prime when I went to reorder. It is now. I would never order this again. Try the SPORTS RESEARCH.
customer_reviews.author: Tippie Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Misleading ..not honest
customer_reviews.text: I just received my container today ..when I ordered it it said they were 35 servings in the container ..once I received it the container says 30 ..so I already have a negative opinion of this company I have finished my container and where it said there was 35 servings when I bought it online ..on the back of the container it’s at 30...,I have used it now and there was exactly 20 servings .. .. Exactly 20 scoops and on the back of the container they said one serving is one scoop ...don’t have a lot of faith in this company.. Definitely deceitful advertising
customer_reviews.author: Brenda080854

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I have a favorite collagen powder but was looking for a smaller canister for my office, so I ordered this. I have a hard time choking this down for 2 reasons; 1- it smells AWFUL! Unflavored collagen protein should not have a smell, but every time I open it I almost gag. 2- it does not dissolve well in my hot beverages, like other collagen proteins have. (I am not returning bc it’s a hassle. I will continue using until it’s gone and never order again.)
customer_reviews.author: SassyPants

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It has zero taste and dissolves in my coffee easily each morning. I’ve been taking it now for 2 months. I just ordered my 4th bottle. I was taking one scoop each morning but my nails are still very thin. My skin looks good & hair seems fuller now. I decided to try 2 scoops each morning and see if it helps my nails. I do wish it came in a larger container. When buying this I researched quite a few brands, for the price & based on others reviews I believe I made the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased item based on reviews I ordered collagen this was my first time ordering this brand if used a different brand before which I loved but decided to give this a try when I opened the collagen I smelled a horrible smell I should’ve stopped there I still made my coffee as I do every day I added the collagen and tried my coffee it was horrible, inedible. I’m not sure if I got a bad batch or what would like to return for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Angela Padilla

customer_reviews.title: This a really good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have Sjogren's Syndrome, gastroparesis, alopecia, and IBS and my body is always in pain. This product is good and helps keep the inflammation down. I really love how my skin is glowing and my hair is growing. Also, I combine broth with this Collagen Powder. I noticed a difference in my stomach area. It is getting smaller. This is a big trouble area for me, but since taking this I have noticed a big difference. I have been taking for about two weeks now. This is helping my autoimmune conditions, and I am glad that I found this product to help my body. I’ve noticed the difference in my legs as well. They look more toned up.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste and smell!
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment! I thought I would give this a try with all its positive reviews. Container has some serious “settling” issues, but the taste is disgusting!!!! I am so disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Tasted like throw up. Literally.
customer_reviews.text: It literally smelt and tasted like puke. I’ll definitely be going back to my other collagen peptide.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Helps knee weakness and hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this because of postpartum hair loss and because I have really weak knees. After about day 4 of taking this everyday I noticed a difference in my knees. They feel totally normal and not fragile. I’ve been using it everyday for almost a month now and my hair is growing back and filling in as well. I feel great. I put 1 scoop in my morning coffee. Even though it says it’s flavorless. You can definitely taste something different. To help I’ve been using a hand frother in my coffee to mix it up well. And it helps with the taste a lot. I would totally recommend this product to anyone who needs help with knee pain!!
customer_reviews.author: luv2bcaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Please help
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item upon reviews and also to help me with my joint and body pains. I mixed this in plain water and it has a really bad taste like ‘sulfur’ taste. I then tried mixing it in my pre-workout drink hoping to mask the taste but it was overpowering. Is it supposed to taste like this? I don’t drink coffee so I can’t try it that way. Maybe I got a ‘bad’ container? Can someone please advise me on this I really want include this in my daily life but I just can’t handle the taste. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying I’m a licensed cosmetologist and cosmetology instructor. So I know first hand how many hoax “make your hair grow faster” products out there. But after seeing awesome results with 2 of my clients I decided to give it a try. The best collagen hands down. I’ve tried about 4 other brands, and they worked ok. Nothing like this one! I cannot Believe how fast I’m seeing results with hair growth ! I’ve been recommending it to All my clients who are growing their hair out !
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Organic, non gmo, made in USA
customer_reviews.text: First time trying collegen powder! I Love that it makes my coffee nice and creamywithoitam aftertastes! My skin is smoother, hair and nails longer. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Half full
customer_reviews.text: I got this about a month ago. Even though the product is fairly good it was only about half full. Dont know if this was a manufacturing mistake. But to make it all good im asking that my next bottle is free. The only thing I know so far is that it has helped with my gut and that pain in both knees seems to be diminishing. I havent yet seen any results in my skin hair or nails. But we will see after the next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Like this brand the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Physician's collagen peptides for a few weeks now. I feel like it has helped my digestion, it remains to be seen if it helps with my skin, although it feels less dry than before, so perhaps that is a response to this supplement. It is best mixed with something warm, I put it in a barley/chicory coffee substitute I enjoy in the mornings. It doesn't dissolve well in cold water, which I've tried also. Doesn't have a weird after taste like other collagen brands I've tried before. Here's to good health! So glad we have so many options these days to offset the less options of readily available pure and clean foods.
customer_reviews.author: B. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to take this product but after 1 scoop in my coffee, my asthma started to act up. I did not know this product had sulfa. I am allergic to this ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful ordering through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The first two containers I ordered were good. They had the transparency information on the back and seemed to work well. The third package I ordered looked completely different, had a different lid, had odd stickers covering the barcode, and lacked any transparency information. It was clearly a fake product and they powder inside was a different consistency. I’d recommend ordering directly through the website!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It may take some time to notice benefits like stronger nails.
customer_reviews.text: It has a better taste than some other collagen products I have tried. It seems also to have helped heal my gut. Don't have nearly as much problems as before. Hands have healed out, finally, after surgery. I was thinking my hands would never be pain free again as it had been almost a year post surgery. But they feel really good now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Weikum-Auda

customer_reviews.title: Not a full 30 day supply
customer_reviews.text: So I began to notice my nails are insanely brittle! Even though this is suppose to help them, they have actually become the weakest in the last month. In addition to that disappointment my 30 day supply lasted exactly 23 days so there’s that. I was trying to give it a full 3-5 months before leaving a review but It’s clearly not working & I didn’t get my money’s worth so....
customer_reviews.author: Nikki E.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I enjoy most about the product is there is no taste, and better yet there is no after taste! I started using the product as a recommended supplement for my Keto diet. I have noticed a substantial reduction of pain in both my hands and wrists. Historically, this time of year with the cold rainy weather, my hands and wrists are very uncomfortable. I plan to continue taking the collagen peptides supplement as part of my daily supplement regime to help with the arthritis pain management.
customer_reviews.author: Blain R

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t purchase again. As other state the bottle comes only half full. But that’s not even the reason. It causes me so much bloating and cramping. The day I stopped the pain immediately stopped! I’ve used other collagens before and never had this issue. I don’t recommend it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Taste
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste. This product is supposed to be unflavored but it definitely has a PLASTIC taste, even when added to hot beverages. Not satisfied with the size of product either. I was expecting a bigger container for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Ann Willis

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Item contents advertised is not what your getting!
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY BUYER BEWARE!! If you are a buyer and reading feedback prior to buying. My advice to you is be aware that you are not fully getting what you're paying for. If I could give a lower feedback number, I would. Product advertises as a 35-serving container (246g/.54 lbs.). But what was delivered was a 30-serving container (212g/.47 lb). Actually I only got 26 servings from my container.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I make bullet proof coffee. He finished his before me and asked how the new collagen was. I’m told him it should be good almost 5 stars on Amazon. I quickly understood why he asked in the first place. It had that “I just threw up” flavor. Maybe I got a bad batch. Not sure, but amazon is refunding which is great.
customer_reviews.author: martha vargas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the third collagen powder I’ve tried, but it’s the first one that I can taste in my bullet coffee, and it’s not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Cadeau's mom

product_meta.title: Collagen Peptides Powder - Enhanced Absorption - Supports Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Post Workout Recovery - Hydrolyzed Protein - Grass Fed, Non-GMO, Type I and III, Gluten-Free, Unflavored
feature_bullets: COLLAGEN POWDER FOR ENHANCED ABSORPTION: Our collagen peptides are double hydrolyzed and contain proven DigeSEB digestive enzymes, giving our Collagen peptides powder IMPROVED ABSORPTION over other collagen supplements. If you are not digesting your collagen powder properly, you're throwing money away! Stop wasting money and start feeling the MANY BENEFITS of Collagen Peptides Powder with DigeSEB.

CLEAN & PURE COLLAGEN PEPTIDES: Our hydrolyzed collagen powder is hormone-free, grass-fed, and pasture-raised. It's also all-natural, non-GMO, and contains 14 essential amino acids to promote vitality and support hair, skin, nails, and JOINTS.

REPLENISH, REPAIR, & RECOVER - Unlike most other collagen supplements our collagen includes DigSEB and 14 essential amino acids to help repair and replenish hair, skin, and nails along with aiding in post-workout & recovery.

NON-GMO & GRASS-FED COLLAGEN PEPTIDES POWDER: We believe in sourcing the best collagen in the world, and we want better than great collagen. We source premium non-GMO, grass-fed, and pasture-raised bovine, giving you the best collagen powder supplement on the market.

SAFETY ASSURED STANDARD OF QUALITY: Our Collagen Peptides Powder is 3rd-party tested for purity and made without the use of harmful additives. Our collagen is manufactured in the USA using imported and domestic ingredients. When you buy our collagen powder you can rest assured it's all-natural and ethically made.
